text: Single (stylized as #Single) is an 2025 Indian Telugu-language romantic comedy film directed by Caarthick Raju and presented by Allu Aravind. The film is produced by Geeta Arts and Kalya Films. It stars Sree Vishnu, Ketika Sharma, Ivana, Vennela Kishore in the lead roles. The film's music was composed by Vishal Chandrashekhar. The film was theatrically released on 9 May 2025. == Cast == *Sree Vishnu as Vijay *Ketika Sharma as Poorva *Ivana as Harini *Vennela Kishore * VTV Ganesh * Kalpa Latha *Rajendra Prasad (Cameo) *Prabhas Srinu *Satya (Cameo) *Reba Monica John (Cameo) *Maanasa Choudhary (Cameo) == Production and Marketing == On 29 February 2024, on the occasion of Sree Vishnu's birthday Geetha Arts officially announced the film with the working title #SV18. The official title of the film was revealed as #Single through a title glimpse on 10 February 2025. On 28 April 2025, the trailer of the film was released. == Music == The soundtrack album and background score for the film were composed by Vishal Chandrashekhar. On 4 April 2025 the first single "Shilpi Yevaro" was released. The lyrics were written by Shreemani and sung by Yazin Nizar. On 17 April 2025, "Sirrakaindhi Single Bathuku" was released with the lyrics by Ramajogayya Sastry and sung by Rahul Sipligunj. == Release == #Single was released release on 9 May 2025. == References == == Other websites == * Category:2025 comedy films
title: Single (2025 movie)
